title: The Crochet Dresses Everyone Is Obsessing Over Right Now
description: These breezy designs are perfect for summer.
text: When it comes to summer fashion, few things feel as breezy and effortless as a crochet dress. Once reserved for boho beach getaways and music festival fields, this handwoven staple has undergone a full-blown style renaissance—and it’s claiming its place as the sartorial hero of the season.Of course, Chloé used the technique on nearly everything—shorts, bags, and shoes. But even designers who typically don’t dabble in crochet are testing the waters. Take a look at Chanel’s spring/summer 2025 collection, and you’ll see knitted midi-length frocks cinched with a bow. Over at Carolina Herrera, crafty polka-dot dresses were on the menu, and at Acne Studios, the big knits continued with a peplum mint creation. From open-weave minis that double as swimsuit coverups to brightly colored maxis that deserve their own rooftop moment, today’s best crochet dresses are endlessly versatile. Layer one over a simple slip for a chic city day look, or wear it solo with strappy sandals and gold jewelry for a hot summer night out.Even better? The season’s standouts come in every shade and silhouette imaginable—from body-hugging halters to relaxed, drop-waist styles. Whether you’re looking for something subtly sexy or sweetly artisanal, the crochet dress is the ultimate one-and-done outfit that does all the work for you.Crochet-Trimmed DressesThe crafty technique is being subtly worked into lightweight dresses. Pick from strapless designs and tiered-waist frocks for a playful silhouette.Old Navy Fit & Flare Crochet-Bodice Maxi DressMagda Butrym Riviera Maxi DressUlla Johnson Gisella Crocheted DressJ.Crew Crochet-Trim DressNow 46% OffCrochet Halter DressesFrom deep and plunging to high necklines, the glorious halter silhouette is having quite the moment. Some styles come with adjustable straps that you can fix to your liking, so you can get a perfect fit every time.Lioness Golden Age Knit Halter Maxi DressAkoia Swim Habana Cotton DressCamila Coelho Lyssa Hand Crochet Halter Mini DressTularosa Thalassa Floral Crochet DressCrochet Dresses With SleevesThere’s no better way to master the reveal-and-conceal trend than with a long-sleeve crochet dress. The airy technique will show a hint of skin, but the extra coverage of sleeves balances the peekaboo design.Andrea Iyamah Terry Cutout Crochet Maxi DressLa DoubleJ Perry Knit DressSNDYS x REVOLVE Fate Mini DressMissoni Dégradé Metallic Crochet-Knit Maxi DressCrochet Floral DressesOf course, florals for spring and summer are a must-have. And the blossoming print will be a hero in your crochet dress collection. Choose from a graphic design in black and white hues or go abstract with a fancy lace-inspired floral.Show Me Your Mumu Vacay Tank CoverupMango Floral Crochet DressSister Jane River Flower Sleeveless Maxi DressDiotima Drift Crochet Backless Maxi DressCrochet Tank DressesEvery closet should have an effortlessly pulled-together tank dress in it. Bonus points if it’s crafted using a fine crochet technique. Beach Riot Holly DressSuperdown Elena Maxi DressAisling Camps Kapok Drop-Stitch Maxi DressNia Thomas Oshun DressCrochet Stripe DressesSummer is practically synonymous with stripes. Whether they’re wavy and colorful or classically nautical, a stripe crochet dress makes seasonal dressing chic.All That Remains Junie DressAnna Kosturova Crochet Cotton Polo DressZoe and Claire Stripe Midi Sweater DresGap Crochet Maxi DressWhy Trust ELLEEvery product featured on ELLE.com is independently researched, tested, or editor-approved. html:
When it comes to summer fashion, few things feel as breezy and effortless as a crochet dress. Once reserved for boho beach getaways and music festival fields, this handwoven staple has undergone a full-blown style renaissance—and it’s claiming its place as the sartorial hero of the season.

Of course, Chloé used the technique on nearly everything—shorts, bags, and shoes. But even designers who typically don’t dabble in crochet are testing the waters. Take a look at Chanel’s spring/summer 2025 collection, and you’ll see knitted midi-length frocks cinched with a bow. Over at Carolina Herrera, crafty polka-dot dresses were on the menu, and at Acne Studios, the big knits continued with a peplum mint creation.

From open-weave minis that double as swimsuit coverups to brightly colored maxis that deserve their own rooftop moment, today’s best crochet dresses are endlessly versatile. Layer one over a simple slip for a chic city day look, or wear it solo with strappy sandals and gold jewelry for a hot summer night out.

Even better? The season’s standouts come in every shade and silhouette imaginable—from body-hugging halters to relaxed, drop-waist styles. Whether you’re looking for something subtly sexy or sweetly artisanal, the crochet dress is the ultimate one-and-done outfit that does all the work for you.

Crochet-Trimmed Dresses

The crafty technique is being subtly worked into lightweight dresses. Pick from strapless designs and tiered-waist frocks for a playful silhouette.

Old Navy Fit & Flare Crochet-Bodice Maxi Dress

Magda Butrym Riviera Maxi Dress

Ulla Johnson Gisella Crocheted Dress

J.Crew Crochet-Trim Dress

Now 46% Off

Crochet Halter Dresses

From deep and plunging to high necklines, the glorious halter silhouette is having quite the moment. Some styles come with adjustable straps that you can fix to your liking, so you can get a perfect fit every time.

Lioness Golden Age Knit Halter Maxi Dress

Akoia Swim Habana Cotton Dress

Camila Coelho Lyssa Hand Crochet Halter Mini Dress

Tularosa Thalassa Floral Crochet Dress

Crochet Dresses With Sleeves

There’s no better way to master the reveal-and-conceal trend than with a long-sleeve crochet dress. The airy technique will show a hint of skin, but the extra coverage of sleeves balances the peekaboo design.

Andrea Iyamah Terry Cutout Crochet Maxi Dress

La DoubleJ Perry Knit Dress

SNDYS x REVOLVE Fate Mini Dress

Missoni Dégradé Metallic Crochet-Knit Maxi Dress

Crochet Floral Dresses

Of course, florals for spring and summer are a must-have. And the blossoming print will be a hero in your crochet dress collection. Choose from a graphic design in black and white hues or go abstract with a fancy lace-inspired floral.

Show Me Your Mumu Vacay Tank Coverup

Mango Floral Crochet Dress

Sister Jane River Flower Sleeveless Maxi Dress

Diotima Drift Crochet Backless Maxi Dress

Crochet Tank Dresses

Every closet should have an effortlessly pulled-together tank dress in it. Bonus points if it’s crafted using a fine crochet technique.

Beach Riot Holly Dress

Superdown Elena Maxi Dress

Aisling Camps Kapok Drop-Stitch Maxi Dress

Nia Thomas Oshun Dress

Crochet Stripe Dresses

Summer is practically synonymous with stripes. Whether they’re wavy and colorful or classically nautical, a stripe crochet dress makes seasonal dressing chic.

All That Remains Junie Dress

Anna Kosturova Crochet Cotton Polo Dress

Zoe and Claire Stripe Midi Sweater Dres

Gap Crochet Maxi Dress

Why Trust ELLE

Every product featured on ELLE.com is independently researched, tested, or editor-approved. We only recommend products that we stand behind, and the merchandise featured on our site is always driven by editorial and product testing standards, not by affiliate deals or advertising relationships. Any content created in partnership with advertisers is marked as such.
